1.name: Attack (All Troops)
1.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

2.name: Attack (All Troops)
2.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander ${1}%

3.name: Defense (All Troops)
3.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

4.name: Lord of War
4.text: When troops led by this commander enter battle, increases attack by (${1} x Commander Star Level)%

5.name: Burning Blood
5.text: Grants an additional ${1} rage every time this commander's troops are attacked

8.name: Health (All Troops)
8.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

9.name: Attack (All Troops)
9.text: Increases the attack of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

10.name: Health (All Troops)
10.text: Increases the health of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

11.name: Defense (All Troops)
11.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

12.name: Fight To The Death
12.text: Increases all damage dealt by ${1}%, but also increases all damage taken by ${2}%

13.name: March Speed (All Troops)
13.text: Increases the march speed of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

14.name: Defense (All Troops)
14.text: Increases the defense of all units led by this commander by ${1}%

15.name: Martial Mastery
15.text: Increases normal attack damage by ${1}%, but decreases active skill damage by ${2}%

16.name: Effortless
16.text: During battles, increases all damage dealt by ${1}% every 10 seconds (up to a maximum of 10%)

17.name: Victory Charge
17.text: When armies led by this commander defeat an army (excluding garrison) belonging to another governor, attack is increased by ${1}% for the next 10 seconds. (This effect will be removed once troops have left battle)

18.name: Last Stand
18.text: Normal troop attacks have a 10% chance to cause this commander's troops to go on a rampage (increases damage by ${1}% for the next 3 seconds, but skills cannot be used for the duration of the effect)
